p: To date, clinical data on the effects of cell therapy on RV function are limited to patients with hypoplastic left heart syndrome. In these infants, cardiosphere‚Äêderived cell therapy was associated with a significant improvement in RV ejection fraction and reduced BNP levels 23. In accordance with these findings, data from the present study suggest that cell therapy may also represent an effective therapeutic intervention to improve RV function in adult chronic heart failure population.
